lead_paragraph: Kevin Canty, who pleaded guilty to manslaughter, shot his wife seven times as their 6- and 9-year-old children watched inside the couple’s Queens home on April 19, 2014.
snippet: Kevin Canty, who pleaded guilty to manslaughter, shot his wife seven times as their 6- and 9-year-old children watched inside the couple’s Queens home on April 19, 2014.

headline.main: Ex-New York Officer Sentenced to 25 Years for Killing Wife
